virtual-sensor.name: ETZ_Dozer_EnviroScanParametersA__conv
virtual-sensor.description: Dozer messages (DozerEnviroScanDataMsg) from ETZ deployment converted to parameter

source.query: select timed, POSITION, DEVICE_ID, GENERATION_TIME, TIMESTAMP, HEADER_SEQNR, HEADER_ORIGINATORID, HEADER_ATIME, PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID, PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_NO, casewhen(PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID=1 AND PAYLOAD_M1!=-2147483647,cast(round(PAYLOAD_M1 / 1000000.0, 6) as CHAR(30)),NULL) as A1, casewhen(PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID=1 AND PAYLOAD_M2!=-2147483647,cast(round(PAYLOAD_M2 / 1000000.0, 6) as CHAR(30)),NULL) as A2, casewhen(PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID=1 AND PAYLOAD_M3!=-2147483647,cast(round(PAYLOAD_M3 / 1000000.0, 6) as CHAR(30)),NULL) as A3, casewhen(PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID=1 AND PAYLOAD_M4!=-2147483647,cast(round(PAYLOAD_M4 / 1000000.0, 6) as CHAR(30)),NULL) as A4, casewhen(PAYLOAD_SAMPLE_VALID=1 AND PAYLOAD_M5!=-2147483647,cast(round(PAYLOAD_M5 / 1000000.0, 6) as CHAR(30)),NULL) as A5 from wrapper where PAYLOAD_MEASUREMENT_TYPE=2
